content.title: Production-Ready Next.js 16 Starter
content.subtitle: Out of the box you have: Next.js 16, React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS v4, Base UI, shadcn/ui, next-intl (EN/AR), Vitest, Playwright, ESLint, Prettier, Husky, and SEO optimizations.

instructions.line1: - This is the homepage. Edit it at app/[locale]/page.tsx
instructions.line2: - Edit navbar in components/navigation.tsx (desktop) and components/mobile-navigation.tsx (mobile drawer), footer in components/footer.tsx
instructions.line3: - Logo in /public/nexcn.svg, favicon and OpenGraph images in /app
instructions.line4: - Content and translations in messages/en.json and messages/ar.json
instructions.line5: - SEO metadata in app/[locale]/layout.tsx, sitemap in app/sitemap.ts

framework.label: Next.js 16 + React 19
framework.description: Latest stable versions with App Router and Server Components

typescript.label: Strict TypeScript
typescript.description: Enhanced type safety with strict compiler options

ui.label: Base UI + Tailwind v4
ui.description: Accessible, unstyled components with modern styling

navigation.nexcnDescription: Next.js starter with Base UI and next-intl
navigation.nextjsDescription: The React Framework for the Web

footer.description: Production-ready Next.js 16 starter with TypeScript, Base UI, comprehensive testing, and bilingual support.
